response: Excellent! Discovery is complete. Now let me hand this off to our developer to start creating your first files.

extracted.business_context: Custom cake bakery that does custom cake orders
extracted.problem_statement: Order tracking is chaos - uses paper and WhatsApp, things get lost
goals: See all orders in one place

users.description: Owner/baker and two employees who take orders
users.permission_notes: Employees can manage orders, owner has full access including prices and reports

summary.solves_statement: Replaces paper and WhatsApp order tracking with a simple digital system
